name: Task Donegeon - 0.0.45
lastChange: Major architectural refactor of app state into multiple contexts. Implemented selective asset library imports, interactive calendar week view, loading/empty states, onboarding wizard, and standardized confirmation dialogs. A11y and UX improvements. Fixed all build errors.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
